-DESCRIPTION-

Super Sea Sucker is a short indie simulation game made for the #TeamSeas project where you dive into the deep sea and suck up trash! Inspired by the #TeamSeas project hosted by MrBeast and Mark Rober, this serves as a nice reminder to keep our oceans clean!
